about_the_game:
STORY

Our story takes place in 1973 America. Our character, Walter Pierce, was born and raised in orphanages in America. Detective Walter Pierce, who solves mysteries in America, is struggling to find a new mystery. Learning about the mysterious suicide of Albert Sinclair, the father of the Sinclair family, from a reporter at the police station before it hits the newspapers, Walter jumps into his car to investigate. Arriving at the mansion, our character meets the Sinclair family and tries to survive while continuing his investigation, but this will not be easy for him.

GAME

Our game is a Story-Based First-Person Action Thriller Horror game.

PUZZLES

In this game, where we diversify the gameplay with various puzzle mechanics, you should pay attention to your surroundings and notes, because your progress in both our main story and extra side stories depends on it.

ENEMIES

We have paid attention to enemy diversity in our game. The movements and attitudes of the enemies may vary. You can fight or flee from enemies while solving mysteries, but be careful, if your equipment runs out while fighting, you better find a place to hide.

COLLECTIBLE AND INTERACTIVE ITEMS

Our character keeps a journal. The journal is updated according to events and items, so don't forget to examine your surroundings. As you progress in the story, you will notice other mysteries around you. You can solve these mysteries from the notes you find or the scenes you see, but don't get complacent. You may not have enough time to examine your surroundings.

content_descriptors.notes: The chase of our character Walter by 4 brothers. Where elements such as saw, ax, cannibalism operate. It is about Walter's adventures in the village and the castle.

name: To Last

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460, 2.70GHz or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 or AMD Radeon™ RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible (must support DirectX® 9.0c or higher)
  • Additional Notes: Low 720p @ 30 FPS, DX11, Ray Tracing OFF
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460, 2.70GHz or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
